name: DreamsCleaner
description:
Use A,W,D,S to move and SPACE to interact.

Horror dreams are cleaned by tapping the SPACE button rapidly.

Naughty dreams are cleaned by charging (holding down) the SPACE button.

You must finish the stage by cleaning a minimum amount of ghost depending on each stage (ex stage 1 need at least 2 ghosts cleaned out of 4 to pass)
